copy-word.commands.copy.title: Copy Word: Copy
copy-word.commands.cut.title: Copy Word: Cut
copy-word.commands.paste.title: Copy Word: Paste
copy-word.configuration.title: Copy Word in Cursor
copy-word.configuration.useOriginalCopyB: Use original Cut/Copy behavior when no text is selected and no current word is defined.
copy-word.configuration.pasteWordBehavio: Indicates the behavior of the Paste command.
The original VS Code behavior (paste the word at the cursor position).
Replace the current word with the clipboard content.
Replace the current word with the clipboard content only when the cursor is in the middle of the word.
